location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Map of Masira Island [Masirah Island xx Jazīrat Maşīrah], Oman. The map highlights the petrol stores, and the RAF and BOAC buildings which have been constructed at Ras Hilf. It also highlights the alighting area and Um Ras village at Um Rasas.The map is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942’. The map itself is marked as Appendix F.The scale at Ras Hilf is approximately 1.5 inches to 1 mileThe scale at Um Rasas is approximately 1 inch to 1 mile
